election.title: NL - Select an Election
election.subtitleGroup: NL - Choose an election group from the list below.
election.subtitle: NL - In this group there are {{ election }} elections available. Please select the Area and the election then click the button below to set up your Political Group inside the election.
election.subtitleOne: NL - There is one election available. Please select the election and click the button below to access the election and set up your Political Group.

addressBook.emptyListMessage1: er zijn geen personen in het adresboek

addressBook.exportHeader: NL - Export person in Address Book

pg-route.title: Deelnemende fractie
pg-route.explanation: Om de lijst aan te maken hoeft u alleen de basisinformatie van de politieke groepering in te vullen.

pg-coalition-definition.addParty: toevoegen nieuwe politieke groepering aan samengevoegde aanduiding

pg-party.createMandate: voer nieuwe machtiging politieke groepering in

pg-party-dialog.headerTitle: voer andere machtiging politieke groepering in
pg-party-dialog.headerText: de ingevoerde gegevens worden opgeslagen in het adresboek

overview.textEmpty1: NL - You don't have any election started.
overview.textEmpty2: NL - Please select one election from the available election group in order to start setting  up your Political Group.
overview.title: NL - Overview Elections
overview.text-center: NL - Hello, your PG team is currently working on these elections:

lists-any-list-candidates-cu-route.explanation: nl - In order to add a new candidate to the list it please complete the form about their information.
lists-any-list-candidates-cu-route.updateExplanation: NL - Please complete the form about their information.
lists-any-list-candidates-cu-route.listPositionLabel: nl - Position number on the list: *
lists-any-list-candidates-cu-route.callSignCheckBox: nl - Display call sign in documents
lists-any-list-candidates-cu-route.useCorrespondenceAddressParty: nl - Use general correspondence address of Party: *
lists-any-list-candidates-cu-route.statementNotToStandAsCandidate: nl - Add statement not to stand as a candidate in another member state:
lists-any-list-candidates-cu-route.declarationOfNonExclusion: nl - Add Declaration that you are not excluded from the right to stand for election in your home Member State/Declaration of non-exclusion from the right to stand for election in your home Member State
lists-any-list-candidates-cu-route.useDeclarationOfSettle: nl - Add Declaration of Intent to Establish:
lists-any-list-candidates-cu-route.candidatesMandateDescription: nl - You need to fill the info of an authorized representative because the residence of this candidate is set outside the European part of Netherlands.
lists-any-list-candidates-cu-route.countryMandateWarningDescription: NL - The Candidate's Mandate will be deleted but not in the Address Book

uniqueListRoute.overPanel: NL - Are you sure you want to revert the final list?
uniqueListRoute.overPanelSubmitter: NL - You need to complete list submitter before finalizing the list.
uniqueListRoute.overPanelList: NL - You need to solve lists errors before finalizing the list.
uniqueListRoute.overPanelCandidateList: NL - You need at least some candidate.

lists-address-book-dialog.title: NL - Select a person from your address book
lists-address-book-dialog.limitExceed: Maximaal van aantal kandidaten ({{ limitExceed }}) per lijst is bereikt.

lists-form-substitutes.explanation: nl - Use the form below to fill information about the second substitute for recovery from absenteeism.
lists-form-substitutes.useCorrespondenceAddressParty: nl - Use general correspondence address of Party: *

listCandidatesRead.removeMultipleCandidate: NL - By deleting this list you will remove all the candidates and costituencies assigned.
listCandidatesRead.emptyTextMultiCostiFirst: NL - The political party will submit one single list to the constituency {{ constituencyName }} for this election
listCandidatesRead.emptyTextMultiCostiSecond: NL - In case you want to continue please press one of the buttons below so to start adding candidates to the list
listCandidatesRead.emptyTextOneCosti: NL - Please press of the buttons below in order to start adding candidates to your list.
listCandidatesRead.personExist: NL - Maybe the candidate already exists, please check the fields: gender, last name, place of residence and date of birth.
listCandidatesRead.checkboxLabel: NL - Show only candidates with warnings and errors

listSubstitutesRead.emptyListSubmitterDescription: NL - In order to add one ore more substitutes you need first to add a list submitter.
listSubstitutesRead.name: NL - Name

finalize-lists-dialog.finalizing: NL - By finalizing, you declare your lists of candidates complete.
finalize-lists-dialog.changesWarning: NL - You can then no longer make changes unless you revert the list.
finalize-lists-dialog.finalDocuments: NL - After this process the lists won't be submitted to the corresponding central electoral commitee yet. To do so you have to go inside section "Final Documents".

list-submitter.name: NL -Name
list-submitter.explanation: Gebruik het onderstaande formulier om informatie in te vullen over de lijstindiener die verantwoordelijk is voor het presenteren van de lijst
list-submitter.correspondanceAddressTitle: NL -Use general correspondence address of party: *

list-substitutes.emptySubmitter: NL - You need to create a Submitter first

candidates-cu-route.explanation: vul gegevens in om de vereiste info over lijsten en documenten voor de geselecteerde verkiezing toe te voegen.
candidates-cu-route.listsSeatsLabel: heeft 16 oif meer zetels bij laatste verkiezing
candidates-cu-route.sixteenSeatsAdvice: NL - By saving this option you are limiting the number of candidates to 50 instead of 80 you can present in a list. All the candidates that stand out will be removed automatically.

candidates-read-route.title: kandidaten
candidates-read-route.listsSeatsTitle: 16 of meer zetels bij laatste verkiezing

annexes-route.annexesDeclaration: NL - I declare I will include the following annex(es) together with the list of candidates (tick as appropriate):
annexes-route.includeModelH3: NL - A statement from the authorised representative(s) of the political group(s) authorising me to to place the designation above the list of candidates, because I have placed a designation above the list placed (model H 3-1 or H 3-2).
annexes-route.includeModelH4: NL - Statements from voters that they support the list, as the list does not qualify for the exemption from this requirement (model H 4).
annexes-route.includeModelH9: NL - A declaration by each candidate appearing on the list that he agrees to sentence his candidature on the list (model H 9).
annexes-route.copy: NL - A copy of a valid identity document of each candidate who does not sit on the body for which the election is held.
annexes-route.includeModelH12: NL - Proof of payment of the deposit, as the list does not qualify for the waiver of this obligation (model H 12).
annexes-route.declarationOfIntendedResidence: NL - A declaration of intended residence of any candidate appearing on the list who is not resident in the area to which the election relates (only in the case of an election of provincial councils, the general board of and water board, a municipal council and the island councils of the public bodies of Bonaire, Saba or Sint Eustatius).

overview-route.systemWarnings: NL - The system has found {{ numberOfWarning }} warning(s) in the list of candidates you are going to present to this election:
overview-route.reviewWarning: NL - A substantive review will takes place only after the central electoral committee has received the written list of candidates together with the final documents. Please take into account that if you continue, there may be (mandatory) data missing from your list of candidates that could lead to an omission.
overview-route.correctListWarning: NL - If you want to make corrections click the link below so to enter again the list. Remember to first revert the list, make your changes and finalize the list again.
overview-route.candidatesWarning: NL - Candidate {{ selectedName }} at list position {{ selectedCandidatePosition }}: {{ selectedReason }}

welcome-route.welcomeTitle: NL - Welcome to the final section for generating the final documentation
welcome-route.welcomeIntro: NL - You have completed all the other sections and you are able to generate the final documents to be presented by the list submitter.
welcome-route.startSteps: NL - Click start in order to access the process.

generate-route.fillFormFields: NL - Fill in the form fields to add the info required about lists and documents to present for the selected election.
generate-route.generateInFrisian: NL - Generate all documents and templates in Frisian: *
generate-route.prepareSeparateDocuments: NL - Prepare separate documents for each candidate
generate-route.processMayBeSlow: NL - Depending on the number of candidates, this process may take some time.
generate-route.theseWillBeGenerated: NL - These is the file that will be generated
generate-route.theseWillBeAttached: NL - These are the annexes that will be attached

finalize-route.stepsFinalized: You have finalize all the steps
finalize-route.whenSigning: When signing your list of candidates, make sure that the same date an time is printed at the bottom of the form pages. This means that each form belongs to the same set, which will also be checked by the central electoral committee.
finalize-route.makeSure: Make sure the various documents are correctly signed.
finalize-route.submittingParty: List of candidates (H1 form) by the submitting party.
finalize-route.authToPlace: Authorization to place the list designation (H3-1 or H3-2 form) by the authorized representative of the political group.
finalize-route.declarationOfSupport: Declaration of support (H4 form) by voter who is registered as a voter with the municipality.
finalize-route.declarationOfAssent: Declaration of assent (H9 form) by candidate.
finalize-route.presentAllDocuments: You have to present all the documents to the central electoral committee between xxxx and xxxx on xxxx (the day of the nomination of candidates). To avoid unnecessary waiting, it is wise to make an before handing in the required documents.
finalize-route.byGenerating: By generating a new Model H1 you are going to remove data of all  the previous generated documents and new Hash-code will be created  at the end of the process.
finalize-route.maintainCurrent: No, maintain the current Model H1

labels.correctionsButton: NL - Make corrections to the list

team-manager-cu-route.explanation: NL - Use the form below to fill information about new user of your team.

empty-team.emptyPGTeamTitle: NL - Your Political Group is empty.
empty-team.emptyPGTeamText: NL - Please add new coordinator or employee in order to create your team so they will start setting up your Political Group.

omissions-cu-route.title: NL - Omissions
omissions-cu-route.description-header: NL - The chairman of the central electoral committee inform that the central electoral committee for the election of the members of {{ electionName }} as noted one or more omissions with the designation {{ politicalGroupDesignation }}
omissions-cu-route.downloading-error: NL - An error occurred while downloading the file. Contact adminstrator

empty-omission.title: NL - Your table of omissions is empty.

pg-custom-autocomplete.suggestion: Invoeren {{ selectedEntity }} als een nieuwe aanduiding

navbar.h1GenerateButtonTooltip: NL - Generation of H1 Draft will be available after the user includes at least one candidate in a list.
